title: FS: 1967 Nevada Sea Blue Deluxe original paint *** SOLD ***

posts.content:
Probably one of the most original and solid buses you will ever find.
All original paint, been touched up in a few areas around window surrounds as expected. 95% original paint.

Never been welded.

All the running gear has been gone through. New tyres and brakes etc...

Newly built 1776 with oil cooler by Laurie Pettit. Done less than 1000 miles.

The paint work is amazing, the van has such an amazing patina . Original blue floor matts and all original interior.

Apart from the engine bus is completely stock and drives superb.

Not the cheapest but one of the very best Â£ SOLD SOLD SOLD

http://s421.photobucket.com/albums/pp29 ... 16/Camper/
Sold thanks to all interested parties, gone abroad to pastures new...

That bus was sweet for sure . Which country did it go to out of curiosity ..

Danny
